comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. I'm launching from a menu a new activity who is a map using offine tiles (on the sd-card) 2. When I launched the activity first, there isn't any problem 3. When I finish it and I relaunch an activity many times, the activity become slower and it crash What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The debug is telling me I've problem with bitmap (outOfMemory) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Android 2.3 & OSMDROID 3.0.5 If you have any advice, thank you ! Cordially Alexis
I am having exactly the same problemand have reported it as issue 265
Close all the duplicate OOM issues.
